name: Blue Line (gcmxyz)
description:
You are John Jones, Detective Inspector, Cardiff CID. 

It is August 2007. One of the wettest summers on record. 

Dark, violent things have been happening recently in Cardiff and you're here to run Special Investigations before setting up a Serious Crime Unit.

Your cases are full of misery, and unsolved. 

Can you tie all the loose threads together?
